==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|ひゃく|しょう|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ひゃくしょう}} compound {{m|zh|百姓|tr=paek sjeng<sup>H</sup>|lit=hundred clans}}. Compare modern {{etyl|hak|-}} {{m|zh|百姓|tr=pak-siang}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

The [[呉音#Japanese|goon]] reading, so likely an earlier borrowing.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|ひゃくしょう|y=go|acc=3|acc_ref=NHK|dev=3}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ひゃくしょう|hhira=ひやくしやう}}

# [[commoner]]s, the common people; the [[masses]]; ordinary [[citizens]]
# a [[farmer]]; a [[peasant]]; the [[peasantry]] in general
# in reference to the [[w:Edo period|Edo period]], short for {{m|ja|本百姓|tr=honbyakushō||the hundred commoner families|pos=a class of farmers with specific rights and responsibilities}}
# country [[bumpkin]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|commoner}} {{ja-r|公民|こうみん}}
* {{sense|the people}} {{ja-r|大御宝|おおみたから}}
* {{sense|ordinary citizens}} {{ja-r|人民|じんみん}}
* {{sense|peasant}} {{ja-r|農民|のうみん}}
* {{sense|bumpkin}} {{ja-r|田舎者|いなかもの}}

=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|百姓と楽しみを同じゅうす|ひゃくしょう と たのしみ を おなじゅうす}}: “taking one's pleasure the same as a commoner” → a lord must know the joys and pains of the people
* {{ja-r|百姓と油は絞るほど出る|ひゃくしょう と あぶら は しぼる ほど でる}}: “commoners and oil [sources] give more the harder you squeeze” → the more you demand of the people, the more you get. Compare {{m|en|blood from a stone}} of roughly opposite meaning.
* {{ja-r|百姓の泣き言と医者の手柄話|ひゃくしょう の なきごと と いしゃ の てがらばなし}}: “the complaints of the peasants and the boasting of the doctors” → a contrast between peasants complaining of poor harvests in a bid to reduce their tax liabilities, against the feats of doctors who will do their utmost to treat even a terminal patient: by extension, an exhortation to put in 101% without grumbling about it
* {{ja-r|百姓の去年物語|ひゃくしょう の こぞ ものがたり}}: “a peasant's tale of last year” → alluding to how peasants would often claim that last year's harvest was better than this year, in a bid to reduce their tax liabilities
* {{ja-r|百姓の作り倒れ|ひゃくしょう の つくりだおれ}}: “a peasant's manufactured collapse” → describing how peasants working too hard can result in too much produce on the market, causing a price collapse and sizable losses: to be one's own [[undoing]], to [[defeat]] oneself by working too hard
* {{ja-r|百姓の秋大名|ひゃくしょう の あき だいみょう}}: “a peasant's autumn lord” → a metaphor for how the autumn season following the harvest is a time of bounty for commoners
* {{ja-r|百姓の所務分けで田分け尽くす|ひゃくしょう の しょむわけ で たわけ つくす}}: “splitting up a commoner's inheritance amounts to a parceling out of fields / to complete nonsense” → a [[pun]] on the reading ''tawake'' for both {{m|ja|田分け||splitting up fields}} and {{m|ja|戯け||nonsense}}, based on how dividing up fields for every generation's inheritance ultimately leads to very small plots and inefficient farming
* {{ja-r|百姓の人を斬ったよう|ひゃくしょう の ひと を きった よう}}: “like cutting a commoner” → a big [[commotion]]
* {{ja-r|百姓の雁を押さえたよう|ひゃくしょう の がん を おさえた よう}}: “like holding down a commoner's goose” → a big [[commotion]]
* {{ja-r|百姓の息が天に昇る|ひゃくしょう の いき が てん に のぼる}}: “a commoner's breath [i.e. spirit] can reach heaven” → [[where there's a will, there's a way]], no matter how weak
* {{ja-r|百姓の不作話と商人の損話|ひゃくしょう の ふさくばなし と あきんど の そんばなし}}: “peasants' talk of poor harvests and merchants' talk of business losses” → farmers and businessmen always grumble about how things aren't going well
* {{ja-r|百姓の万能|ひゃくしょう の ばんのう}}: “a commoner's all-around abilities” → alluding to how a peasant (now farmer) had to be [[self-reliant]] and a [[jack-of-all-trades]]
* {{ja-l|百姓百色|ひゃくしょう ひゃく いろ}}: “a hundred commoners, a hundred colors” → the word "commoners" might be a [[collective noun]], but the people included in that category are [[various]] and [[sundry]]
{{der-bottom}}

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|百姓一揆|ひゃくしょう いっき}}: a [[peasant]]s' [[revolt]] or [[uprising]]
* {{ja-l|百姓請け}}, {{ja-r|百姓請|ひゃくしょう うけ}}: a kind of [[tax system]] in the medieval period, whereby local influential families would undertake local tax administration on behalf of the lord
* {{ja-r|百姓往来|ひゃくしょう おうらい}}: [[educational]] materials for commoners' children
* {{ja-r|百姓仕事|ひゃくしょう しごと}}: commoners' work, [[farm]] work
* {{ja-r|百姓代|ひゃくしょう だい}}: during the [[w:Edo period|Edo period]], the administrative head, advocate, and representative of a village's commoners
* {{ja-r|百姓分|ひゃくしょう ぶん}}: the commoner [[class]], the [[peasant]] or [[agricultural]] [[caste]]
* {{ja-l|百姓家}}, {{ja-r|百姓屋|ひゃくしょう や}}: a commoner's house, a [[farmhouse]]
* {{ja-l|百姓読み}}, {{ja-r|百姓読|ひゃくしょう よみ}}: reading [[kanji]] in one's own way, guessing the reading and/or meaning for each character based on its shape or component elements
{{der-bottom}}
